name: Amy Lee Segami
biography:
Chicago artist specializing in Suminagashi (Painting on Water TM).
Born in China; grew up in Hong Kong. Became U.S. citizen.
B.S. and M.S., 1979-1982,  fluid mechanical engineering, Illinois Institute of Technology.
N.B.: The name "Segami", legally acquired by the artist, is an anagram of "images", spelled backwards.
Solo and group exhibitions since 1989.
Permanent collection, Museum of New Mexico, Santa Fe.

Source: Personal communication from the artist 12/01.
